title: The Family Circumstances of the Irregular Witch
description: Alyssa, a witch who lives alone in the forest, picks up a human baby one day. Despite her confusion, Alyssa named the baby Viola and decided to raise her. 16 years later, Viola had not only grown into a daughter who adores Alyssa, but also into a woman of exceptional proportions, and the people around them mistook Viola for Alyssa's mother.  A slice of life told by a mother and daughter who were inverted in appearance and full of gags! Parent and child deliver a hilariously funny comedy!

episodes.title: The Irregular Circumstances of the Close-Knit Family/The Educational Circumstances of the Mysterious Life Form
The Commonplace Circumstances of the Witch's Child-Rearing/The Romantic Circumstances of the Little Brother Position
The Reminiscing Circumstances of the Witch-Girl Time Crew/The Sniffly Circumstances of the Healthy Daughter
The Requesting Circumstances of the Late-Blooming Orc/The Monitoring Circumstances of the Egg and Big Sister
